property.name: fs.defaultFS
property.description: The default filesystem URI that serves as the root for relative paths. Points to the 'default' bucket in MinIO storage.

property.name: fs.s3a.access.key
property.description: Access key ID for MinIO authentication. For production, use environment variables or secured credential providers.

property.name: fs.s3a.secret.key
property.description: Secret access key for MinIO authentication. For production, use environment variables or secured credential providers.

property.name: fs.s3a.endpoint
property.description: MinIO server endpoint URL. Uses Docker service name 'minio' and default port 9002. For HTTPS, change protocol to https:// and enable SSL below.

property.name: fs.s3a.path.style.access
property.description: Enables path-style access for MinIO (required). MinIO doesn't support virtual-hosted style access.

property.name: fs.s3a.impl
property.description: The implementation class for S3A filesystem. Must be set to enable S3A protocol support.

property.name: fs.s3a.connection.ssl.enabled
property.description: Disables SSL for MinIO connections (since we're using HTTP). Set to true and configure certificates if using HTTPS.

property.name: fs.s3a.connection.maximum
property.description: Maximum number of simultaneous connections to MinIO. Adjust based on the workload and MinIO server capacity.

property.name: fs.s3a.threads.max
property.description: Maximum number of threads for S3A filesystem operations. Higher values improve parallelism but increase memory usage.

property.name: fs.s3a.fast.upload
property.description: Enables accelerated upload mechanism for better performance. Recommended for most workloads.

property.name: fs.s3a.fast.upload.buffer
property.description: Buffer type for fast uploads. 'disk' is most reliable. Alternatives: 'array' (memory) or 'bytebuffer' (off-heap).

property.name: fs.s3a.aws.credentials.provider
property.description: Credential provider implementation. Simple provider reads from configuration (good for development). For production, consider IAM or environment variable providers.

property.name: fs.s3a.attempts.maximum
property.description: Maximum retry attempts for failed operations. Helps handle transient network issues.

property.name: fs.s3a.connection.timeout
property.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds (60 seconds). Adjust based on the network latency characteristics.

property.name: fs.s3a.multipart.size
property.description: Size threshold for multipart uploads (100MB). Larger values reduce overhead but increase memory usage.

property.name: fs.s3a.multipart.threshold
property.description: Minimum file size for multipart upload (100MB). Files smaller than this will be uploaded in single request.
